name: Pixel Gear
description: Pixel Gear is a pixel style VR shoot-em-up game with a variety of humorous cartoon monsters and ghosts as enemies.The multiplayer mode is great fun to play with your friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
